name: linearregintercept
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Calculates the linear regression intercept for the specified symbol and interval using the specified parameters and the Twelve Data API.

symbol.description:
Instrument symbol, can be any equity, index, ETF, forex or cryptocurrency
E.g. `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`, ...

interval.description:
Interval between two consecutive points in time series
Supports: `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`

series_type.description: The type of series to consider (e.g., `open`, `high`, `low`, `close`). Default is `close`.

time_period.description: The period of time over which to calculate the intercept. Default is 9.

format.description: The format of the returned data (`csv` or `json`). Default is `json`.

outputsize.description: Default `30` when no date parameters are set, otherwise set to maximum
